1.title: Team Success and Playoff Position
1.prompt: On a scale of 0 to 10 (0 being no influence, 10 being extremely high influence), relative to MVPs from all seasons, rate how significantly the team's success and playoff position influenced the MVP voting and results this season. Provide reasoning, including the team's win-loss record, playoff seeding, and whether the player is from a contending or struggling team. Always begin your answer with your rating on a scale from 0 to 10. Do not forget this. Format your rating like so: [[<RATING> / 10]].

2.title: Impact on Winning
2.prompt: On a scale of 0 to 10 (0 being no influence, 10 being extremely high influence), relative to MVPs from all seasons, rate how strongly the player's individual performance contributed to their team's success. Consider game-winning moments, leadership impact on team dynamics, and how the player's absence might have affected team performance. Always begin your answer with your rating on a scale from 0 to 10. Do not forget this. Format your rating like so: [[<RATING> / 10]].
